title: Parameters for Laserscan to Pointcloud Node

min_height.description: The minimum height to sample in the point cloud in meters

max_height.description: The maximum height to sample in the point cloud in meters

angle_min.description: The minimum scan angle in radians

angle_max.description: The maximum scan angle in radians

angle_increment.description: Resolution of laser scan in radians per ray

scan_time.description: The scan rate in seconds. Only used to populate the scan_time field of the output laser scan message

range_min.description: The minimum ranges to return in meters

range_max.description: The maximum ranges to return in meters

target_frame.description: If provided, transform the pointcloud into this frame before converting to a laser scan. Otherwise, laser scan will be generated in the same frame as the input point cloud

transform_tolerance.description: Time tolerance for transform lookups. Only used if a target_frame is provided

inf_epsilon.description: Precison tolerance limit, only used if use_inf is true

use_inf.description: If disabled, report infinite range (no obstacle) as range_max + 1. Otherwise report infinite range as +inf
